notification.title: $t(common.reusable.inform) {{name}} $t(common.reusable.anonymously)
notification.service price: This service costs 99 cents and the user will be informed via Email anonymously
notification.message: $t(common.reusable.hello) {{name}}, we are sorry to inform you that one of your ex-partners has contracted std ($t(common.reusable.std)) around the time of your encounter. He/she wishes to stay anonymous and even we do not have the possibility to see his/her personal information.This notification is automated.We strongly advise you to check with you doctor and possibly inform your ex-partner.

notification.alert messsage: This message will automatically notify you ex partner!
